name: Shuriken Planet
description:
Welcome to the Shuriken planet 

-The main enemies on this planet are balloons, they fly all over the atmosphere, so be fast and clean them up. 

-RED BALOONS are only vulnerable if you hit them with a RED SHURIKEN. 

-BLUE BALOONS are only vulnerable if you hit them with a BLUE SHURIKEN.

 -To fire RED SHURIKEN click and drag on the left side of the screen.

 -To fire BLUE SHURIKEN click and drag on the right side of the screen.
